Package com.logicea.cardsapp.service.cards

Class AccessCheckService

java.lang.Object
com.logicea.cardsapp.service.cards.AccessCheckService
@Service public class AccessCheckService extends Object
A service that provides methods for checking if a specified User has specific privileges.

    • userIsMember

      public boolean userIsMember(org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.User user)
      Checks to see if a User has ONLY the authorities of a UserRole.MEMBER.
      Parameters:
      user - A User instance.
      Returns:
      true iff the User has ONLY the authorities of a UserRole.MEMBER.

      Parameters:

    • userHasAccessToCard

      public boolean userHasAccessToCard(org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.User user, CardEntity card)
      Checks to see if a User has access to a specific card.
      Parameters:
      user - A User instance.
      card - A CardEntity instance pulled from our database.
      Returns:
      true iff the User has access to the card.
